item.title: "TB Mukt Bharat Abhiyan" Screening Drive Conducted in Jogulamba Gadwal District
item.description:
<![CDATA[Jogulamba Gadwal: As part of the nationwide "TB Mukt Bharat Abhiyan" (Tuberculosis-Free India Campaign), a special screening and awareness program was conducted today at the District Tuberculosis Control Office under the direction of District Medical and Health Officer (DM&HO) Dr. S.K. Siddappa and under the supervision of Dr. G. Raju, District TB Program Officer.
Objective of the Program:
The campaign focused on screening individuals from high-risk populations for tuberculosis and related hea...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Telangana Government Gives 35 Acres for Important Projects in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal has received a significant boost in development with the government allocating 35 acres for new infrastructure projects. The land will support the construction of government buildings and electricity substations, enhancing public services in the region.
The initiative aims to improve administration and service delivery, marking a key step in regional development. Facilities planned for the area include electricity substations, warehouses for power materials, and equipmen...]]>
item.author: Rajesh M, Https, Latest News Hyderabad, Telangana, India, World, Please Enter Your Name Here

item.title: Akhanda Hanuman Chalisa Parayanam at Beechupally on Shravana Pournami
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: A grand devotional event is scheduled to take place at the sacred pilgrimage site of Beechupally in Erravelli Mandal, Jogulamba Gadwal District, on Saturday, August 9, 2025, coinciding with the auspicious occasion of Shravana Pournami (Raksha Bandhan Pournami).
With the blessings and auspicious wishes (Mangalashasanams) of Sri Tridandi Srimannarayana Ramanuja Chinna Jeeyar Swamy, the event will feature the Hanuman Chalisa Parayanam (recitation) 41 times in front of Sri Abhaya Anjaneya S...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
